website_summaries.verdict: Its gentle curve, extra-wide display, and innovative multitasking features make this monitor the best solution for working with multiple PCs.
pros: Comparable to having a pair of 27” monitors side-by-side
Optimized for using 2 PCs at once
cons: This monitor works best with PCs, not Macs

website_summaries.verdict: Dell’s massive curved monitor will grab your attention, but its stunning resolution, array of convenient ports, and versatility will allow you to keep it for a long time to come.
pros: World’s first 49-inch dual QHD monitor is like having a pair of 27-inch displays side by side
cons: A curved monitor this nice was bound to be pricey

customer_reviews.title: 5k Not Supported at 60hz on 2017 15inch Macbook Pro. (It is supported at 30hz)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knowing that 5k was not support older mac books and the mac pro. I watched a couple youtube reviews with newer MacBook Pros and said 5k was supported. I have a 2017 15in MacBook Pro with Radeon Pro 560 4 GB graphics. 5k at 60hz is not supported on my MacBook Pro. 5k at 30hz is supported though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hamblen

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome monitor
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor to replace my aging dual monitor setup and man, let me tell you, this is an awesome monitor. The monitor was packed extremely well and undamaged. The box looks and weighs like a small black coffin. Poor UPS guy must have been mumbling some unkind words carrying that thing to my house. I've had this monitor for about a week now and totally loving it. Clear and crisp picture with no dead pixels. That plus the extras built into the monitor make this a great productivity monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REAL ESTATE! Need I say more.
customer_reviews.text: Most of all... the stopping the need to open and close screens all the time. You have real screen space to work with. I can have many applications open I at once and just be on the go. Clear ,sharp, real estate. What more could you ask for? Never going back to the box!
customer_reviews.author: North West Art

customer_reviews.title: Not integrated well with Mac
customer_reviews.text: It is not possible to use a single connection with a Mac to get the highest resolution supported by the monitor. This is an issue with all Macs apparently, not just my Mac Mini 2018. After a lot of searching, I found that you need to use PBP mode to create two virtual monitors. This works OK but sometimes the second monitor will not come back if the machine goes into sleep mode. I tried powering off/on the monitor and using the monitor to no effect. The only consistent way I've found is to reboot the machine. On the positive side, the image is great and it's nice to have all of the real estate.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wessman

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is gigantic. The pictures in the description do not do this thing justice. It is truly a work of art. Setup was fast and easy, it goes perfect with my new PC rig. not a single person has come over and not been WOWWWED by this thing. I'm so stoked to have purchased it. Only drawback was the shipping time, took a while to arrive, but when it did.. it was GLORIOUS. Assuming this is due to the fact that Fed Ex or UPS didn't deliver it. It was delivered by a freight company and I had to schedule a time for them to come deliver it. The box is THAT big.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Perez

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with all computers.  Make sure you check before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT TO USE AT FULL RESOLUTION AND USE A NEWER MACBOOK PRO! Also beware if you are not sure if it works with your computer but really hope so and would like to try, you will need to pay a 15% restocking fee for returning because technically there is nothing wrong the item. I feel like this product is not advertised correctly. It seems to be a know issue so the information should be advertised or at least a "check if this will work with your computer before purchasing" warning would be helpful to customers. Would be a great monitor if it actually worked with MacBook Pro though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for CAD and graphic art
customer_reviews.text: takes a bit to get used to one wide monitor. The Dell software actually works well and allows to "lock" onto a virtual screen like you have 3 instead of just one wide one. AutoCAD is really nice for this. I have every pallet open and docked and still have plenty of working room available! Same for Photoshop or any Adobe programs.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Color quality
customer_reviews.text: I have my Dell 7480 connected to StarTech(bought from dell) docking station and station is connected to monitor with HDMI & DP. Colors won't match in PBP mode. Not really worth buying. Dell told me to get the docking station which is not made by Dell but sold by Dell and their tech department cant help with this. Bottom line this is not worth 1200$. Updat: I was able to figure out the color settings by myself. After all it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ladi

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. Going to 1 monitor really cleaned up the desk and the PGP feature is perfect for working on multiple computers. The size is great and the resolution is more than enough to handle anything you plug into it
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews and researching the monitor, I decided to take the plunge as wanted to replace my dual 27” monitor set up. Works perfectly for my May 2015 MacBook Pro 15.4. Resolution, size and aesthetics are amazing. I love this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TONS of input and output
customer_reviews.text: I use this for business to keep a minimum of five screens open at a time. Great quality. The host of connections on the back allow me to keep my iPhone, iPad, and other accessories charged and connected for use. Screen is easily adjustable in every way. A bit pricey compared to buying two or three 32" monitors but the small foot print made the decision for me. I am going to buy a second one to stack on top!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas G. Benge

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this monitor... he's not a gamer so can't comment on that, but it's great for having lots of windows open at once!! Pictures looks awesome on it! There's not even any set up (unless you want there to be) - he just plugged in his Macbook Pro and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: TheBfamily

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I have made in years!
customer_reviews.text: I work 24/7 and needed a power horse for a monitor. This is the best monitor I have ever used. I can seamlessly transition from screen view to screen view, it displays perfectly when on conference calls, and it allows me to multitask much more efficiently. If you are grappling with the cost, I can say in my experience this is worth it. I previously purchase the Samsung version and it was awful. Love this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Phdgator

customer_reviews.title: Sweet view!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for work. Was a few hundred cheaper on Amazon then Dell directly. Picture quality is amazing and with my docking station, the presentation is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Melis

customer_reviews.title: great ultrawide monitor
customer_reviews.text: i have had this monitor for months for web dev and i was using my mac pro on it but after updating to Catalina the display scale is a mess... I guys these monitors are not meant for mac users but if you're a window user ... you will love it 100%
customer_reviews.author: shimspedy

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor. I’ve owned Dell’s 34” ultrawide, Dell’s 38” ultrawide, and now this stellar 49” ultrawide! Picture is amazing and there is so much real estate for activities! I have it set to snap to 3 regions using Dell’s software and it’s truly a sight to see. If you work with multiple windows, this thing is a godsend. I do IT work and can run multiple remote support sessions at once while having several other windows open. It’s not inexpensive, but if you value a fantastic image with a ton of productivity, this is the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Gleicher

customer_reviews.title: Looking to get dual monitors? Consider this instead
customer_reviews.text: TLDR: It’s a great purchase. I’m a software developer and have been setting up a personal office to work from the home. Originally I was considering the dual monitor setup with adjustable mounting arms but when a coworker in the office got a curved monitor it piqued my interest. After reading up on the current curved monitors available I decided on this one. It has fit every need that I have and the setup is easy. One recommendation: make sure that you have an extra person to help you when you get ready to set it on the desk as it is awkward to carry for just one person.
customer_reviews.author: Harley May

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I have simply been loving this monitor. It is HUGE at 49" wide, and it literally consumes like 80% of my desk. However being able to put at times 3 Windows side by side has been great. I have not had any dead pixels, and the monitor has simply been working great. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Devin A.

customer_reviews.title: You have to pay to play
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth it for removing the black bar in the middle of my view alone. New perspective really.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Should you? Oh yes you should!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them. I have 2 in an over/under configuration. Dells desktop manager tames the vast real estate I now have and I’ve reached a new level of nerdvana.
customer_reviews.author: David M Karakas

customer_reviews.title: Two 27" Monitors in one!
customer_reviews.text: This solves the problem of too many keyboards and mice one the desk. One big monitor for two computers with KVM built in. Perfect. Wish it were a bit more curve, but not a biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Edvar

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor with a huge display, keep in mind the distance though.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. But consider the curvature and distance. If you’re close enough (less than 70cms), reading on the sides might be difficult, and it’s pretty much like a flat one. Now above that distance, it start to feel better. I got dizzy when I was really close.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Rosset

customer_reviews.title: stunning addition to my "home studio"
customer_reviews.text: Hooking it all together was a cinch! I am so pleased the the resolution proved to be superb. The new "real estate" is very much to my liking--49 inches is a LOT of territory!! Shipping was excellent, and the display arrived very quickly. (I don't play games on with this device, so no rating concerning that.)
customer_reviews.author: John Hess

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this monitor!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. If you buy one of these and the screen cracks Dell will not help you. You have to purchase the most expensive warranty to get screen replacement. Dell do not have spare parts if the screen cracks and you have no recourse.
customer_reviews.author: Dermot OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Paired great on a MacBook Pro 16”
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this to my VERSA Ergotron pole. Great as a USB hub as well!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Connell

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor ever
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor to date. Huge. Software is pretty awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Literally the best invention for a monitor. The 5k is perfect Resolution from my 2013 iMac!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Howard Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Monitor in the world
customer_reviews.text: If you are an Architect, a designer or a gamer, look no further than this. Enough said...
customer_reviews.author: Thank God

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough go hold 3 windows
customer_reviews.text: I have no word but wonderful to describe this product. This babe is big and applicable for my daily job as an accountant. If you are a multi tasking person, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cang Vu

customer_reviews.title: Does work on Macs, use Display Menu app
customer_reviews.text: For all Mac users, download the Display Menu app and use. Understand you may not get the full resolution but it does work. Im on a Macbook Pro Mid 2015, and I get up to 3840x1080 59hz to work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Neist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for multi-windows.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor. Wide screen fits 3 normal-size windows. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Wagner

customer_reviews.title: It’s not curved enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s not curved enough for work. I do not game. I preferred two 24” curved screens on dual monitor arms
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not Curved at all. You need to be extremely far away to take advantage of the FLAT SCREEN, I'm driving myself crazy trying to work in it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Hebry

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect productivity tool and a lot of flexibility in connections.
customer_reviews.author: JBW

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant monitor
customer_reviews.text: Silent, easy to connect, brilliant graphics. I cannot find any point of complaint. It’s worth it’s price and is an upgrade to any workstation!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolaus von Unger

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and just as advertised. Sharp, bright, great color and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Gunter Wessels

customer_reviews.title: Best investment in my business I've made yet
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I don't know how I got along without it. Absolutely 110% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS D LATHER

customer_reviews.title: Workflow Monster!!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great for work and play!! Running 2 computers on 1 screen is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy and good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dell Marketing USA LP Ultra Sharp 49" Screen Led-Lit Monitor Black (U4919DW)
product_meta.description: Dell Marketing USA LP Ultra Sharp 49" Screen Led-Lit Monitor Black (U4919DW)
feature_bullets: The world's Fi RST 49" curved Dual QHD monitor for an immersive work experience that boosts productivity. Equivalent to two 27-inch QHD monitors, you'll get a brilliant uninterrupted view, multitasking features and USB-C connectivity
Dimensions - with stand: 47.84" W x 9.94" D x 18.06" H
Multitask efficiently with two PC sources using built-in Picture-by-Picture and keyboard, video and Mouse Features

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
